## ChampionStat class

A representation of the champion's base stats.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ChampionStat 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(base, increment)](./shieldbow.championstat._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>ChampionStat</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [base](./shieldbow.championstat.base.md) |  | number | The base value of the stat - the value at level 1. |
|  [increment](./shieldbow.championstat.increment.md) |  | number | The value at which this stat increases every level (the scaling). |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [at(level)](./shieldbow.championstat.at.md) |  | A utility to calculate the base value of this stat at a certain level. |
